title: Our Media’s China Problem | Guests: Franklin Graham & Dave Rubin | 5/4/20
description:
A Newsweek article claims that the coronavirus came from a lab, and Dr. Fauci was involved. But why are our news sources so desperate to say otherwise and support China? Disney is in BIG trouble with this pandemic. Glenn tells of his terrible experience with Home Depot. BlazeTV host Dave Rubin joins to discuss tyranny on California beaches and his new book, “Don’t Burn This Book.” Franklin Graham sets the record straight after the media reported that his charity, Samaritan’s Purse, was kicked out of Central Park for discriminating against the LGBT community. Mother of 7 Mary Sabbatino moved to Kentucky to find more freedom, only to be investigated for breaking social distancing rules and homeschooling her kids.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
